title: From last week my pixel XL1 has bootloop issue & have done factory reset. Still the problem persist
content:
I have been using Google Pixel XL 1 from last 2 years.

From past week or so the phone has gone into boot loop and restarting. The phone needs to be switched to bootloader mode to switch off else it will be stuck at Google brand logo 'G' and restarts.

I went into recovery mode and did factory reset. Still the problem persist. 


What would be the issue and how to resolve it? 

Can  software flashing help solve it ?
